text: Hatton is an unincorporated community in northwest Callaway County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The community is on Missouri Route E 6.5 miles west of Auxvasse.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 1st ed., 1998, p.38 ==History== A post office called Hatton was established in 1882, and remained in operation until 1953. Frank Hatton, an early postmaster, gave the community his last name. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Callaway County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Hatton, Missouri
